entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Rigolet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:21 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Rigolet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:28 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow. Windy. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. High minus 6. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 24. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
